Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a two-run home run in the second inning
Mickey Moniak made it 3-2 with a 409-foot homer to right-center in the sixth
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams were forced to wait out a lengthy rain delay at the outset for the second straight night
Others: The Tigers moved two games over.500 at 68-66 for the first time since May 7, when they were 19-17
The Angels (54-79) lost their seventh straight game and have dropped 13 of 15
